import axios from"axios";import{url as baseUrl}from"../api";import*as ACTION_TYPES from"./types";import{toast}from"react-toastify";/**
 * @Actions
 * CheckIn CRUD OPERATIONS
 * returns API response from server
 * =================================
 * fetchAll()
 * fetchById()
 * create()
 * update()
 * Delete()
 */export var fetchAllFHealthTips=function fetchAllFHealthTips(onSuccess,onError){return function(dispatch){axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"healthtips")).then(function(response){dispatch({type:ACTION_TYPES.FETCH_ALL_HEALTHTIPS,payload:response.data});console.log(response);onSuccess();}).catch(function(error){onError();console.log(error);});};};export var fetchAllHealthTipsType=function fetchAllHealthTipsType(onSuccess,onError){return function(dispatch){axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"healthtiptypes")).then(function(response){dispatch({type:ACTION_TYPES.FETCH_ALL_HEALTHTIPSTYPE,payload:response.data});console.log(response);onSuccess();}).catch(function(error){onError();console.log(error);});};};export var createHealthType=function createHealthType(data,onSuccess,onError){return function(dispatch){axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"healthtiptypes"),data).then(function(response){dispatch({type:ACTION_TYPES.CREATE_HEALTH_TYPE,payload:response.data});onSuccess();toast.success("Health Tip Type is added successfully!");}).catch(function(error){onError();toast.error("Something went wrong, please try again");});};};export var createHealthTips=function createHealthTips(data,onSuccess,onError){return function(dispatch){console.log(data);axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"healthtips"),data).then(function(response){dispatch({type:ACTION_TYPES.CREATE_HEALTH_TIPS,payload:response.data});onSuccess();toast.success("Health Tip Type is added successfully!");}).catch(function(error){onError();toast.error("Something went wrong, please try again");console.log(error);});};};export var updateHealthTipsType=function updateHealthTipsType(data,id,onSuccess,onError){return function(dispatch){console.log(data);axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"healthtiptype/").concat(id),data).then(function(response){dispatch({type:ACTION_TYPES.UPDATE_HEALTH_TIPS_TYPE,payload:response.data});onSuccess();toast.success("Health Tip Type is added successfully!");}).catch(function(error){onError();toast.error("Something went wrong, please try again");console.log(error);});};};export var updateHealthTips=function updateHealthTips(data,id,onSuccess,onError){return function(dispatch){console.log(data);axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"healthtip/").concat(id),data).then(function(response){dispatch({type:ACTION_TYPES.UPDATE_HEALTH_TIPS_TYPE,payload:response.data});onSuccess();toast.success("Health Tip Type is added successfully!");}).catch(function(error){onError();toast.error("Something went wrong, please try again");console.log(error);});};};export var deleteHealthTips=function deleteHealthTips(id,msg){return function(dispatch){console.log(id);axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"healthtip/").concat(id)).then(function(response){dispatch({type:ACTION_TYPES.DELETE_HEALTH_TIPS,payload:response.data});toast.success("Health Tip deleted successfully!");msg();}).catch(function(error){toast.error("Something went wrong, please try again");console.log(error);msg();});};};export var deleteHealthTipsType=function deleteHealthTipsType(id,msg){return function(dispatch){console.log(id);axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"healthtiptype/").concat(id)).then(function(response){dispatch({type:ACTION_TYPES.DELETE_HEALTH_TIPS,payload:response.data});toast.success("Health Tip Type deleted successfully!");msg();}).catch(function(error){toast.error("Something went wrong, please try again");console.log(error);msg();});};};
